newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha strong again, eastern cargoes eyed.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha strong again, eastern cargoes eyed.

text.p: NWE naphtha was notionally firmer again on Tuesday following Monday's high numbers and dealers said a scarcity of product would hold prices high.
A trader was heard offering a Skikda at $4 over the quoted high cif in NWE. Other barrels were scarce, except for four small Russian pieces seen available from now until the first week of October.
These were being talked at the quoted cif mean or below.
Dealers said high prices in Europe were likely to attract barrels from Middle- and Far-Eastern markets.
